price: О ви који верујете, бојте се Аллаха и говорите само истину,
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَقُولُواْ قَوۡلٗا سَدِيدٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha waqūlū qawlan sadīdan
